definitions.text: a general officer of the highest rank
the head of a religious order or congregation
a fact about the whole (as opposed to particular)
examples: he discussed the general but neglected the particular
We are generaled by an incompetent!

definitions.text: applying to all or most members of a category or group
not specialized or limited to one class of things
prevailing among and common to the general public

examples: bearing a general resemblance to the original
a general description of the merchandise

definitions.text: of worldwide scope or applicability; ; - Christopher Morley
examples: the shrewdest political and ecumenical comment of our time
